text: December Avenue is a 5-piece indie pop/alternative rock band from Manila, Philippines known for their viral compositions online. The band is one of the most streamed OPM bands of all-time.https://www.bworldonline.com/december-ave- is-most-streamed-artist-in-phl/ The band is composed of Zel Bautista on vocals and guitars, Jem Manuel on guitars, Don Gregorio on bass, Jet Danao on drums and backing vocals, and Gelo Cruz on keyboards and backing vocals. Bautista, Manuel, Gregorio, and Danao started out in their alma mater University of Santo Tomas in 2007. Cruz, an alumnus of De La Salle-College of St. Benilde, was later added in 2016. Bautista is the chief composer of the band. Originally known for their predominantly English songs, the band has released Tagalog songs since 2016.December Avenue | Tower of DoomDecember Avenue profile on Bandwagon ==Members== *Zel Bautista - vocals, acoustic guitar *Jem Manuel - lead guitar *Don Gregorio - bass guitar *Jet Danao - drums, percussion, backing vocals *Gelo Cruz - keyboards, backing vocals ==Discography== Studio albums *December Avenue (2016) *Langit Mong Bughaw (2019) EPs *Time To Go (2010) *Sleep Tonight (2011) ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Award !Category !Details !Result |- | rowspan="3" | 2019 | rowspan="3" | 4th Wish Music Awards | Wishclusive Rock/Alternative Performance of the Year | "Kahit Di Mo Alam" | |- | Wishclusive Collaboration of the Year | "Kung Di Rin Lang Ikaw" (with Moira dela Torre) | |- | Wish Group of the Year | December Avenue | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Filipino rock music groups Category:Musical groups from Metro Manila Category:Musical groups established in 2007
title: December Avenue (band)
